org.numenta.nupic.datagen

Class ConsecutivePatternMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.datagen.PatternMachine
      • org.numenta.nupic.datagen.ConsecutivePatternMachine

  • public class ConsecutivePatternMachine
extends PatternMachine
    Utilities for generating and manipulating patterns consisting of consecutive sequences of numbers, for use in experimentation and tests.
    Author:
    Chetan Surpur, David Ray
    See Also:
    PatternMachine
